sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Profile.css"; import { Button, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Profile = () => { const user = useSelector((state) => state.userReducer.user); const admin = useSelector((state) => state.adminReducer.admin); const isAuth = useSelector((state) => state.userReducer.isAuth); const isAuthAdmin = useSelector((state) => state.adminReducer.isAuthAdmin); return (
{isAuth ? (
{user && user.firstname} {user && user.name} {user && user.email} {user && user.phone}
) : isAuthAdmin ? (
{admin && admin.firstname} {admin && admin.name} {admin && admin.email}
) : null}
); }; export default Profile;
